column5: Looking for some outfitters/resorts to check out.
If your looking for fly-in american places check out some of the places in Manitoba as well
If you google american plan fly-in fishing you will have plenty of sites to search. or try www.ontariossunsetcountry.caGood luck there are plenty to chose from!

try Stormer Lake Lodge, it's not a fly-in but it has a great fishing site,,north of Red Lake. The food is great, the staff are friendly and the equipment is top notch. The bonus is it's a heck of a lot cheaper than flying in.Located on Stormer Lake there is a creek that runs into Kirkness and the walleye and northerns are plentiful.
http://www.halleyscamps.com/ Great place, great people. Tell them Erik Stave sent you. Where are you from in Iowa?

way north lodge - almost everything you could ask for including excellent lake trout in two lakes, major league northern in favouable lake and some of thebest walleye that there can be in setting net. phish
